p: For WCE scenarios, NPP increases by approximately 5% over the 20 th c. and an additional 18% over the 21 st c. ( Fig 8A, Table 6). NPP varies by less than 3% across all WCE scenarios within any time period. For FF-NCE, NPP does not vary over the 20 th c. but decreases by 10% over the 21 st c. ( Fig 8A, Table 6). NPP for NF-NCE increases by 1% over the 20 th c. and decreases by 8% over the 21 st c. ( Fig 8A, Table 6).
